name: Proof of authority-bond
text:
If no local administration or application or petition therefor is pending in this State, a domiciliary foreign personal representative may file with a court in this State in a judicial circuit in which property belonging to the decedent is located, authenticated copies of the representative's appointment and of any official bond the representative has given. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
Rules of Court
  Filing documents, see HPR rule 76.
